page.title: 17 Shops
page.content: There is no shopping centre in Longhope and the local people have to supplement the facilities of{village {shop , butcher and post office}by the variety of{mobile traders}who call regularly.There is a{baker, {greengrocer,fishmonger,laundry and {fish and chip van}in addition to the normal{milkman and postman}.People also use mail order catalogues or travel to the main shopping centres in nearby towns.This is a problem for those with no car but we found a strong community spirit meant people were willing to fetch items and offer transport.The local tradespeople are finding it hard to compete against supermarket prices and variety.
